ExampleSentences.Sentence: This young woman has found the ideal listener in you.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (A ta młoda kobieta znalazła w panu idealnego słuchacza.)

ExampleSentences.Sentence: It makes it more interesting for the listener.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (To czyni to bardziej interesującym dla słuchacza.)

ExampleSentences.Sentence: People say I'm a good listener.
